row_1.title: Personal Growth / Ambition Mindset
row_1.column_1: You are frightened by changes and prefer things to stay as they currently are. You are not interested in change or growth.
row_1.column_2: You are starting to understand the possibilities of growth in all areas of your life, though you feel stuck.
row_1.column_3: You've experienced an acceptable status level, & wish to maintain this level. You're not interested in further growth requiring more effort.
row_1.column_4: You always look for ways to grow and people who can help you become a better version of yourself. You may have a Business/Life Coach

row_2.title: CEO Mindset
row_2.column_1: You feel your company should provide direction for your business future & you depend on their support to determine your success.
row_2.column_2: You understand the concepts of being self-made and try to align with a company that will help support your desired growth.
row_2.column_3: You work to improve your skills, but feel your company/manager should be responsible to provide the tools needed to succeed.
row_2.column_4: You treat your business like "You, Inc." You have marketing/business plans & you do not rely on others to invest in your success.

row_3.title: Sense of Urgency
row_3.column_1: You are afraid of doing things that others may perceive as "pushy" & you tend to let life happen at its own pace & aren't quick to act.
row_3.column_2: You are beginning to realize that you need to act quickly to seize opportunities in your life, yet you don't know how to do it.
row_3.column_3: You find there are times when you have acted quickly & it has helped you and others, yet you find it hard to do when the stakes are highest.
row_3.column_4: Your belief is that things need to happen right now before something changes and you relentlessly encourage others to move now.

row_4.title: Your Team
row_4.column_1: You do not see the benefit in adding a member to your team, or you would not want the responsibility.
row_4.column_2: You feel an assistant or partner could be helpful, but you haven't figured out how to fund them or how they would fit into your system.
row_4.column_3: You have at least 1 other member on your team and you have clearly defined roles for each person.
row_4.column_4: You have a full production team that predictably generates business whether you are in the office or not. Each member knows their role.

row_5.title: Systematic & Proactive
row_5.column_1: You start each day without a plan. You are best at winging it.
row_5.column_2: Most of your day is spent reacting to phone calls and emails. Your best intentions sometimes take the back seat to the crisis of the moment.
row_5.column_3: You have created systems that limit crisis management, giving you more time to prospect for new business.
row_5.column_4: You map out your days which keeps you focused on business generating activities regardless of what's going on around you.

row_6.title: Production Results
row_6.column_1: Your average 12 Month Productions is: Less than 5 loans per month.
row_6.column_2: Your average 12 Month Productions is: 6-10 loans per month.
row_6.column_3: Your average 12 Month Productions is: 10-20  loans per month.
row_6.column_4: Your average 12 Month Productions is: 21+ loans per month.

row_7.title: Competitive Mindset
row_7.column_1: You feel competition is only for athletes and do not care about how you rank amongst your peers.
row_7.column_2: You want to win personally & professionally in all areas of your life but aren't sure how to succeed.
row_7.column_3: You like to win at the things you deem important and feel the effort is more important than the results.
row_7.column_4: You want to win at everything you do and you are willing to put forth whatever effort is needed to guarantee victory.

row_8.title: Industry Lifestyle
row_8.column_1: You feel you should always separate business & pleasure, & treat each closing as a business transaction.
row_8.column_2: You'd like to find others with your same mindset to collaborate with but aren't sure where to find these groups to reach out.
row_8.column_3: You go to industry events and enjoy socializing at these events but prefer not talking shop during your personal time.
row_8.column_4: You enjoy talking shop with friends, family & clients. You don't consider it "work". Hanging out with others in "Biz" is fun, like a hobby.
